definition: wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
regardless of weather conditions/rain, hail or shine
tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable
lit. wind and rain sweeping through the town (idiom)/fig. a big scandal/an uproar/the talk of the town
lit. in the same boat under wind and rain (idiom); fig. to stick together in hard times
lit. wind and rain darken the sky (idiom); fig. the situation looks grim
to go through thick and thin (idiom)
lit. storm clouds approach/troubles lie ahead (idiom)
tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable

sentences.english: True extremely not easily Huan Yao brave the life disturbances facing.
sentences.chinese: 人生的風風雨雨真的很不容易還要勇敢的面對。

sentences.english: If you expect the rainbow, you must first be used to experiencing storm.
sentences.chinese: 如果你期盼彩虹，那就應習慣承受風雨。

sentences.english: A broken wood bridge, looked like was damaged by the thunderstorm.
sentences.chinese: 一個斷裂的木橋，看上去象是被暴風雨沖垮的。

sentences.english: The stirring event was well canvassed.
sentences.chinese: 那樁驚人的事情已經是滿城風雨。

sentences.english: China-ASEAN relations have withstood the test of crises and disasters.
sentences.chinese: 中國和東盟的關係經受住了風雨災禍的考驗。

sentences.english: There's a storm coming, so let's sheet in the sail.
sentences.chinese: 暴風雨要來了，咱們收帆吧。

sentences.english: We all trials and hardships to walk, past experience has stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我們一路風雨兼程地走來，過去的經歷已經定格。

sentences.english: When more than half of my life, experienced a lot of wind and rain, can understand this story.
sentences.chinese: 當我人生過半，經歷了一番風雨後，才懂了這故事。

sentences.english: Its crew consisted of themselves and a boy to assist---truly a poor equipment with which to face a great and stormy ocean like the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 這隻裝備簡陋的小船，就要駛向太平洋的暴風雨了。

sentences.english: The soldiers laboured their way in the storm.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們在暴風雨中喫力地前進。

sentences.english: The old building fell down in the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那棟舊樓在暴風雨中倒塌了。

sentences.english: Many trees were overthrown by the storm.
sentences.chinese: 許多樹被暴風雨刮倒了。

sentences.english: Fly high in a rainstorm like an eagle. Thresh about in a rough sea like a beach swimmer.
sentences.chinese: 像老鷹在風雨中翱翔，像弄潮兒在海浪中搏擊。

sentences.english: The clouds warned that a storm was coming.
sentences.chinese: 烏雲預示着將有暴風雨來臨。

sentences.english: The ship was at the mercy of the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那隻船在暴風雨中失去控制。

sentences.english: The latest round of storms also battered Zhengzhou, capital of Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 最新一輪的暴風雨還襲擊了河南省會鄭州。

definition: the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
great changes/ups and downs/vicissitudes/abbr. of 滄海桑田|沧海桑田[cang1 hai3 sang1 tian2]
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
